description: Michael Gilworth was seen getting into a blue Ford Mondeo on Thursday evening, a police force says.
title: Spring Hill prisoner on the run 'should not be approached'
title_page: Spring Hill prisoner on the run 'should not be approached' - BBC News
maintext:
Police have appealed for help to trace a man who has been on the run from an open prison.
Thames Valley Police said Michael Gilworth, 38, absconded from Spring Hill Prison near Aylesbury, Buckinghamshire, at about 20:45 GMT on Thursday.
He has been described as 6ft tall (1.83m) with a slim build, ginger hair and a beard, and a number of tattoos. He was known to frequent Stockport, Greater Manchester, police said.
Det Con Melanie Cannon said: "If you see Gilworth, do not approach him and call 999 instead."
